00013 using Microsoft.Drawing;
00014 using System.IO;

00016 namespace Msdn.UIFramework
00017 {
00018     public class ImageElement : UIElement
00019     {
00020         private string source;
00021         private Bitmap image;
00022         private bool transparentBackground;
00023         private IImage imagingImage;
00024         private bool alphaChannel;
00025         private bool stretch;
00026 
00027         public ImageElement()
00028         {
00029             this.transparentBackground = false;
00030             this.Opacity = 255;
00031         }
00032 
00033         public string Source
00034         {
00035             get
00036             {               
00037                 return source;
00038             }
00039             set
00040             {
00041                 source = value;
00042                 this.LoadImage();
00043                 this.OnInvalidate();
00044             }
00045         }
00046 
00047         public bool Stretch
00048         {
00049             get
00050             {
00051                 return this.stretch;
00052             }
00053             set
00054             {
00055                 this.stretch = value;
00056                 this.OnInvalidate();
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         public Bitmap BitmapImage
00061         {
00062             get
00063             {
00064                 return image;
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         public bool TransparentBackground
00069         {
00070             get
00071             {
00072                 return transparentBackground;
00073             }
00074             set
00075             {
00076                 transparentBackground = value;
00077             }
00078         }
00079 
00080         public bool AlphaChannel
00081         {
00082             get
00083             {
00084                 return alphaChannel;
00085             }
00086             set
00087             {
00088                 alphaChannel = value;
00089             }
00090         }
00091 
00092         public int Width
00093         {
00094             get
00095             {
00096                 if (stretch)
00097                 {
00098                     return width;
00099                 }
00100                 else
00101                 {
00102                     return this.image.Width;
00103                 }
00104             }
00105             set
00106             {
00107                 width = value;
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111         public int Height
00112         {
00113             get
00114             {
00115                 if (stretch)
00116                 {
00117                     return height;
00118                 }
00119                 else
00120                 {
00121                     return this.image.Height;
00122                 }
00123             }
00124             set
00125             {
00126                 height = value;
00127             }
00128         }
00129         
00130 
00131         private void LoadImage()
00132         {
00133             if (this.image != null)
00134             {
00135                 this.image.Dispose();              
00136             }
00137             
00138 
00139             if (source != null)
00140             {                
00141                 try
00142                 {                  
00143                     source = Path.Combine(Canvas.ApplicationPath, source);                    
00144                     image = new Bitmap(source);                  
00145 
00146                    IImagingFactory factory = ImagingFactory.GetImaging();
00147                    factory.CreateImageFromFile(source, out imagingImage);
00148                 }
00149                 catch{}                                                      
00150             }
00151         }
00152 
00153         protected override void OnRender(Graphics graphics)
00154         {
00155             if (this.image != null)
00156             {
00157                 if (transparentBackground)
00158                 {
00159                     graphics.DrawImageTransparent(this.image, this.Rectangle);                     
00160                 }
00161                 else if (alphaChannel)
00162                 {                    
00163                     graphics.DrawImageAlphaChannel(this.imagingImage, this.Left, this.Top);
00164                 }
00165                 else if (stretch)
00166                 {
00167                     graphics.DrawImage(this.image, this.Rectangle, new Rectangle(0, 0, this.image.Width, this.image.Height), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00168                 }
00169                 else
00170                 {
00171                     graphics.DrawAlpha(this.image, this.Opacity, this.Left, this.Top);
00172                 }
00173             }
00174         }
00175     }
